org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Class XmlMessageParser

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.XmlMessageParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageParser
public class XmlMessageParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageParser

The XmlMessageParser parses incoming xml-messages and tries to extract the information needed for a correct execution of the associated command.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
